thread.title: Property owners can apply to Columbus for fix-up help
thread.title_full: Property owners can apply to Columbus for fix-up help | The Columbus Dispatch

author: The Columbus Dispatch
title: Property owners can apply to Columbus for fix-up help
text:
The Columbus City Council is expected to approve $2.2 million to help homeowners, developers and landlords fix up their properties and prevent properties from going into disrepair.
Members will meet at 5 p.m. today at City Hall.
The program is part of a contract Council approves each year to prevent properties from becoming vacant and degrading neighborhoods.
Capital funds are used to fund the program.
Those interested must fill out applications and submit proposals to the cityâ€™s development department. Those who need more information should call (614) 645-2489.
